tip.redirect:
Please configure Strava to accept the following Authorization Callback Domain for authentication of your application:

__constructedURIToShow__

warn.no-accesstoken: Missing Strava access token. Authorization has not been completed before node initialization.
warn.no-configuration: Missing Strava configuration or credentials. Authorization has not been completed before node initialization.

error.no-credentials-ui: ERROR: Received query from UI without the needed credentials
error.no-credentials: ERROR: no credentials - should never happen
error.username-error: Error! Strava node has failed to fetch the authenticated user's name.
error.accesstoken-error: Error! Strava node has failed to fetch a valid access token.
error.csrf-token-mismatch: CSRF token mismatch, possible cross-site request forgery attempt.
error.no-code: The callback from Strava did not contain a required code
error.unexpected-statuscode: Strava replied with the unexpected HTTP status code of __statusCode__

message.authorized: <html><head></head><body>Successfully authorized with Strava. You can close this window now.</body></html>
